thread.title: Watch Hero Security Guard Shoot And Kill Bank Robber
thread.title_full: Watch Hero Security Guard Shoot And Kill Bank Robber

author: David Hookstead
title: Watch Hero Security Guard Shoot And Kill Bank Robber
text:
TOP 5534623 
Graphic footage has been released of bank security guard Brian Harrison shooting and killing robber Laurence Turner. 
Turner attempted to rob Alpine Bank in Rockford, Illinois January 20, and entered the building firing immediately, according to NBC affiliate WALB . 
However, his attempt didn’t last long. Harrison is shown in the recently released footage firing two deadly shots into Turner, who collapsed and died in the doorway. ( SLIDESHOW : Celebrate The Second Amendment With These Gorgeous Gun-Loving Women) 
WATCH: 
Winnebago County State’s Attorney Joe Bruscato announced Tuesday that Harrison would not face any charges for his heroic actions. 
Rockford Police Department Chief Dan O’Shea also added Harrison’s actions were needed to”eliminate and take care of the threat.” 
This video should serve as a warning for criminals everywhere that good guys with guns will shoot back.
